parameters.name: jobStatus
parameters.description:
The payrun job status
Supported state changes:
- *: Draft | Forecast | Abort
- Draft: Release | Abort
- Release: Process | Abort
- Process: Complete | Cancel

CalendarWeekRule.description: Defines different rules for determining the first week of the year

CaseFieldAggregationType.description: Aggregation type for a period case field PayrollEngine.CaseFieldTimeType.Period

CaseFieldCancellationMode.description: The cancellation mode for a regulation case field

CaseFieldTimeType.description: The time period type for a regulation case field

CaseFieldTimeUnit.description: The date type for a regulation case field

name.description: Gets or sets the column name

expression.description: Column expression used to filter rows

valueType.description: Gets or sets the type of data stored in the column

valueBaseType.description: Gets or sets the base type of data stored in the column

DataColumn.description: Represents a column in a DataTable

name.description: Gets or sets the relation name

parentTable.description: Gets or sets the relation parent table name

parentColumn.description: Gets or sets the relation parent column names

childTable.description: Gets or sets the relation child table name

childColumn.description: Gets or sets the relation child column names

DataRelation.description: Represents a data relation in a DataTable

values.description: Gets or sets the row values (JSON, type matching to the column)

DataRow.description: Represents a row of data in a table

name.description: Gets or sets the data set name

tables.description: Gets the collection of tables contained in the data set

relations.description: Gets the collection of table relations contained in the data set

DataSet.description: Represents an in-memory cache of data in tables

name.description: Gets or sets the table name

columns.description: Gets the collection of columns that belong to this table

rows.description: Gets the collection of rows that belong to this table

DataTable.description: Represents one table of in-memory data

DatePeriod.description: A date period between the start and end date

DayOfWeek.description: Specifies the day of the week

LogLevel.description: Specifies the meaning and relative importance of a log event

PasswordChangeRequest.description:
Password change request
Use cases:
- set initial password: new=required, existing=ignored
- change existing password: new=required, existing=required
- reset password: new=null, existing=required

PayrunJobStatus.description:
The payrun job status
Supported state changes:
- *: Draft | Forecast | Abort
- Draft: Release | Abort
- Release: Process | Abort
- Process: Complete | Cancel

ValueScope.description: The scope for a payroll value

ValueType.description: The payroll value types for cases
